channel.title: How do speed up weapons melle attacks.Only a bit.Also-something else
channel.description:
Ok,I want to speed up my melle items attacks.How do I do that? PS: Don't tell me to go to tuts-I looked. Just give me the code.I want everything to move as fast as a scimitar would be real runescape.Includes barrows. I would also like to know how to make 2 handed items,2 handed.In example-a torags hammers with no shield able to be put on.
TY ;D

item.title: How do speed up weapons melle attacks.Only a bit.Also-something else
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

You can adjust the speed by editing in Client.Java, Find if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == (4718)) //dharoks axe { PkingDelay = 8; wepdelay = 8; }
And Change the PkingDelay and Wepdelay and find a speed you’re happy with.
BTW torags hammers are 2 handed, there isnt a way to stop wielding a shield with it yet (as far as i know)

Read full topic
item.source: How do speed up weapons melle attacks.Only a bit.Also-something else
